wiki.text:
'HHC' may refer to:

* Hand Held Computer, used by the US Census Bureau in 2009 for
  information transfer
* Headquarters and Headquarters Company, a company-sized unit of the United
  States Army
* Hereditary hemochromatosis, a genetic mutations that causes iron accumulation
* HHC Hardenberg, a Dutch football club
* Hill hold control, a mechanism used to assist start-up of automobiles
  on inclines
* Hip Hop Congress, an organization encouraging the growth hip hop culture
* [[Hip Hop Connection]], a long-running hip-hop magazine
* Hispanic Health Council, a Latino social well-being organization
* Hungarian Helsinki Committee, a non-governmental human rights organization
  based in Budapest, Hungary
* New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation, a public hospital and clinic
  group in New York City
* Calcium-sensing receptor, a GPCR
